chapters.title: Chapter 26: The Irrevocable Words
chapters.info: Alwhin, p. 432 (554)—Assistant to the High Lady Suroth of Seanchan; she is (among other things) in charge of giving dance orders to Thera. She was the sul'dam originally intended to hold Nynaeve's leash when Liandrin attempted to “give” her to the Seanchan as a damane.
